title: Ukrainian mother's joy after phone call with son she thought had been killed
summary_full: Nazar Daletskyi's family were sure he had been killed and had buried what they thought was his body in 2023.
summary_public: Nazar Daletskyi's family were sure he had been killed and had buried what they thought was his body in 2023.
